Key Match Events: Axar Patel and Kohli calmed nerves with sensible batting
Axar's 72-run fourth-wicket partnership with Kohli was crucial
Axar was run out short by Quinton de Kock
Bumrah conceded two runs in his 18th over
Suryakumar Yadav took a brilliant catch to dismiss David Miller in the last over
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli looked up the sky with hands aloft after the win
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli announced their retirement from T20Is after the win
India's fans celebrated the win, marking sweet redemption for Kohli
Miscellaneous Highlights: India chose to bowl after winning the toss
The game was played in Bridgetown
The final score was 176/7 for India and 169/8 for South Africa
